verses.verse: (For the choir director; on a stringed instrument. [A Psalm] of David.) Hear <WH8085> my cry, <WH7440> O God; <WH430> Give <WH7181> heed <WH7181> to my prayer. <WH8605>
From the end <WH7097> of the earth <WH776> I call <WH7121> to Thee, when my heart <WH3820> is faint; <WH5848> Lead <WH5148> me to the rock <WH6697> that is higher <WH7311> than <WH4480> I.
For Thou hast been <WH1961> a refuge <WH4268> for me, A tower <WH4026> of strength <WH5797> against <WH4480> <WH6440> the enemy. <WH340>
Let me dwell <WH1481> in Thy tent <WH168> forever; <WH5769> Let me take <WH2620> refuge <WH2620> in the shelter <WH5643> of Thy wings. <WH3671> Selah. <WH5542>
For Thou hast heard <WH8085> my vows, <WH5088> O God; <WH430> Thou hast given <WH5414> [me] the inheritance <WH3425> of those who fear <WH3372> Thy name. <WH8034>
Thou wilt prolong <WH3254> the king's life; <WH3117> His years <WH8141> will be as many <WH1755> generations. <WH1755>
He will abide <WH3427> before <WH6440> God <WH430> forever; <WH5769> Appoint <WH4487> lovingkindness <WH2617> and truth, <WH571> that they may preserve <WH5341> him.
So <WH3651> I will sing <WH2167> praise <WH2167> to Thy name <WH8034> forever, <WH5703> That I may pay <WH9608> my vows <WH5088> day <WH3117> by day. <WH3117>
